name: my-bookings
description: Rest APIs on AWS architecture for online room booking

scripts.api-integration:dev: rm -rf openapi-integration/dev/output && serverless integration create --output openapi-integration/dev/output --type http --stage=dev
scripts.api:dev: npm run api-integration:dev && npm run api-integration-merge:dev
scripts.deploy-booking-api:dev: serverless deploy function -f bookingApi --stage dev --region eu-central-1

author: Davide Fruci
